title: Pony Soldier
occurrences: Pony Soldier chief knows much.
Pony soldier rifle - Enfield. Shoot many bullets
But go with this, this fine tenderfeet Pony Soldier. NO!
I need flag too like real Pony Soldier.
Pony Soldier has spoken.
Please, Pony Soldier do not move, do not say anything - please.
Bringing in a captive, a red coat Pony Soldier.
where we have hunted for a hundred snows leave us Pony Soldier.
Go Pony Soldier. But have no fear my young men will not follow.
The Pony Soldier speaks with the tongue of the snake that ratties.
A Redcoat Pony Soldier has come among us his medicine is powerful...
Is good rule for Pony Soldier camp. In Cree camp we fly flag day and night.
Everybody in camp say: Why have you come Pony Soldier?
Everybody say: Pony Soldier very brave to come here.
The Pony Soldier says he comes to make peace.
That's true Pony Soldier. There'll be tangled trouble.
Pony Soldier...
The Pony Soldier knows.
Pony Soldier
The Pony Soldier promises to bring the law and keep the peace.
The Pony Soldier promises that that law shall be the same for all the children of the Queen...
This is the law of the Cree people. If the Pony Soldier tries to take them...
But if the Pony Soldier tries to steal the white woman...
The Pony Soldier has spoken.
But if it happens the Pony Soldier speaks with a forked tongue...
Did the Pony Soldier talk to the chief?
The Pony Soldier has given him a knife and some cloth to tell the people...
I did not wish Pony Soldier to tell inspector Frazer of my mistake.
Dom't worry Onechanee Awakun. The Pony Soldier sent me to protect you.
The Pony Soldier promisses the same law for white men and Indiana alike.
The Pony Soldier promises this killer will be punished.
I will surrendered and step down if the Pony Soldier speaks with a forked tongue.
The Pony Soldier speaks with a straight tongue.
You will do as the Pony Soldier request The prisoners in your keeping.
Pony soldier, father!
I'm very proud of my Pony Soldier father riding with the chief.
Pony Soldier father...
I wish to go too, Pony Soldier Father.
Your chiefs have smoked in Council with The Pony Soldier.
